text: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ سَآءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.
translation.id.indonesian: Allah telah menyediakan bagi mereka azab yang sangat keras, sesungguhnya amat buruklah apa yang telah mereka kerjakan.
